main event: On 6 November 1957, Mr. John Smith observed a bright, round, luminous object hovering over Tiffin, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes before disappearing,The object was estimated to be 30 to 50 feet in diameter and had a metallic surface,Several other citizens in Tiffin also reported seeing the unidentified object,The USAF radar facility reported no radar returns during the time of the incident,The object was described as having a bright light at the center surrounded by a halo of smaller lights.
witness description: Mr. John Smith and two children.
